results.name: Number of permutations of [n] with exactly three (possibly overlapping) occurrences of the consecutive step pattern given by the binary expansion of n, where 1=up and 0=down.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 7..130
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 19 2014
